title: Brunch burrito
description: The beans and tortillas can be made ahead for these Mexican breakfast wraps and the rest takes minutes to prepare. Perfect for a lazy Saturday morning with the family.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/3½oz dried black beans, soaked overnight in cold water
175g/6oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
2 large tomatoes, flesh finely chopped, juice and seeds drained
1 large red hot chilli, finely chopped
